title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: Una been remember say around July, snr bros mark Zuckerberg been launch this "thread" app and people been de hype the app wetin no good. E come almost be like say dem wan suffocate twitter and if you know de on thread you know even follow at all.But then, time no de always disappoint. I can't even remember the last time I heard anything about that thread of a thing and some persons that were not that active online those moment the thread was trending might not even have known that such an app existed and even made a serious wave at the onset.
